title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 12 large mushrooms, stems removed and chopped
instructions: In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped mushroom stems and garlic, cooking until tender.
In a bowl, mix cream cheese, Parmesan, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Stuff the mushroom caps with the mixture and place them on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender and the tops are golden.
